resources.string: Always show icon in status bar
Multiple cells may share the same location.\u000A

When Wapdroid is managing Wi-Fi, use the Wi-Fi button found in the Menu options in Wapdroid to temporarily override control.\u000A\u000AWapdroid responds best when Wi-Fi sleep policy is set to Never, found under Android Settings, Wireless \u0026 networks, Wi-Fi settings, Menu button, Advanced.
To automatically manage Wi-Fi, the service must be enabled in the Wapdroid Settings, but pressing menu, then Settings, then checking Manage Wi-Fi.

Wapdroid runs in the background, recording cell towers near WiFi networks to which you connect. When in range of those towers, WiFi is turned on, otherwise it is turned off to save battery power. Please report issues or questions to http://wapdroid.com.\u000A\u000A
